description: Phase 8 - Polish & Advanced Features: Sound effects, visual polish, level progression, and score improvements

userStories.title: Level Progression System
userStories.description: As a player, I want increasing difficulty as I progress so the game stays challenging.
acceptanceCriteria: Each level spawns more ships (5 base + level number)
Ship speed increases slightly each level (+5% per level)
Build phase time decreases slightly each level (30s base, -1s per level, min 20s)
Level number displayed in HUD
npm run build passes without errors
userStories.notes: Use GameStateManager.level to scale difficulty in CombatPhaseSystem and PhaseStateManager

userStories.title: Score Display Improvements
userStories.description: As a player, I want to see a detailed score breakdown at the end of each round.
acceptanceCriteria: End-of-round score breakdown shows: ships destroyed, territories held, bonus points
Score popup appears briefly when points are earned during gameplay
High score saved to localStorage and displayed on game over screen
npm run build passes without errors
userStories.notes: Create ScorePopup component, update GameOverScreen to show high score

userStories.title: Sound Effects - Combat
userStories.description: As a player, I want audio feedback during combat to make the game more immersive.
acceptanceCriteria: Cannon fire sound plays when player fires
Explosion sound plays when ship is destroyed
Impact sound plays when cannonball hits terrain
Sounds use Web Audio API or Phaser audio
npm run build passes without errors
userStories.notes: Use Phaser's built-in audio system. Can use programmatic audio generation or simple tone sounds as placeholders

userStories.title: Sound Effects - UI and Phases
userStories.description: As a player, I want audio cues for phase transitions and UI actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Phase transition sound plays when phase changes
Piece placement sound plays when wall piece is placed
Cannon placement sound plays when cannon is deployed
Victory jingle plays on level complete
Defeat sound plays on game over
npm run build passes without errors
userStories.notes: Keep sounds subtle - short beeps/tones are fine

userStories.title: Visual Effects - Explosions
userStories.description: As a player, I want visual explosion effects when ships are destroyed and projectiles hit.
acceptanceCriteria: Particle explosion appears when ship is destroyed (orange/red particles)
Small impact effect appears when cannonball hits terrain
Water splash effect appears when cannonball misses (hits water)
Effects are performant (no frame drops)
npm run build passes without errors
userStories.notes: Use Phaser's particle system or simple sprite-based animations

userStories.title: Screen Shake Effect
userStories.description: As a player, I want screen shake on big impacts to add punch to the combat.
acceptanceCriteria: Camera shakes briefly when cannon fires
Stronger shake when ship is destroyed
Shake is subtle and doesn't cause motion sickness
npm run build passes without errors

userStories.title: Multiple Island Maps
userStories.description: As a player, I want variety in the maps I play on.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 different map generation presets (small island, archipelago, large island)
Map type changes each level or is randomly selected
All maps have valid castle placements and playable coastlines
npm run build passes without errors
userStories.notes: Modify MapData.ts to support different generation parameters
